titles.title: Waste Minimization Revenue Act of 1988
A bill entitled the Waste Minimization Revenue Act.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 9/9/1988--Introduced. Waste Minimization Revenue Act of 1988 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to impose fees of: (1) $7 per ton on virgin packaging materials; and (2) seven cents per wholesale container of plastic, glass, or metal. Exempts from the fee any packaging made of recycled materials. Establishes in the Treasury the Waste Disposal Assistance Trust Fund and describes how monies are to be appropriated to it.
